instalacja.tekst1:
Welcome to the Oversee system installer.
We will go through this process step by step. :)



Please fill in all the fields (if you need help, click ):
instalacja.tekst2:
We were able to connect to the MySQL server!



Please give the name of the database:
instalacja.tekst3:
Time to create an owner account. ;)



Please complete the required fields:
instalacja.tekst7:
The installation was successful!
The website is ready. Enjoy the use of our system. ;)
instalacja.modaltekst1:
This is the name of the MySQL server (or host).
Can be in the form of a website address or IP address of the server.

It should be in the hosting admin panel or in email with the data from the hosting company.
instalacja.modaltekst2:
This is the login of database administrator.

It should be in the hosting admin panel or in email with the data from the hosting company.
instalacja.modaltekst3:
It is the password of database administrator.

It should be in the hosting admin panel or in email with the data from the hosting company.
instalacja.modaltekst4:
This is the name of the database.
It is used to connect to a database and manipulate it.

Naming rules:
  • It must consist entirely of letters or numbers.
  • The maximum length is 64 characters.
  • The minimum length is 4 characters.
  • It can not contain spaces.
instalacja.modaltekst8: Password can not be shorter than 5 characters and longer than 30 characters.
instalacja.placeholder12: Please enter confirmation code that was sent to your email address:
instalacja.placeholder13: Enter the URL to the image:
instalacja.modaltekst13:
Logo in the format 1:1 (square) will be displayed best. Supported formats are .jpeg / .jpg / .gif / .png.

In order to obtain the URL of images, you can use the hosting images such as:
  • imgur.com
  • imgsafe.org
  • postimage.io
  • tinypic.com


The image will be automatically scaled to the desired size.

You can later change the logo.
instalacja.modaltekst14:
Will be displayed next to the logo on the navigation bar and the tab in the browser.

It can also be searched for in the search engines (Google, Yahoo!, Bing).

The name should be 4 to 50 characters.
instalacja.blad1: All fields are required to continue...
instalacja.blad2:
All fields are required to continue...

If you do not have a password for the MySQL server, we recommend set in the administration panel.
instalacja.blad3: Unfortunately, failed to establish a connection to the MySQL server, these figures are incorrect.
instalacja.blad4: Unfortunately we failed to write data to a file. Try again.
instalacja.blad5: The field is required. Please refer to the rules of nomenclature ().
instalacja.blad6: Failed to establish a connection to the MySQL server, try again...
instalacja.blad7: An error occurred while trying to write data to a file, try again...
instalacja.blad8: An error occurred while trying to create a database, try again...
instalacja.blad9: An error occurred while trying to create a table "users", try again...
instalacja.blad10: All required fields must be completed.
instalacja.blad11: The password must be between 5 and 30 characters.
instalacja.blad12: The passwords are not the same...
instalacja.blad15: Lastname may consist of only letters...
instalacja.blad16: Login can contain only letters and numbers...
instalacja.blad17: The specified email address is already assigned to another user...
instalacja.blad18: It seems that the database already listed person with such a login name, and therefore generated a new login.
instalacja.blad19: An error occurred while trying to add the user to the database, try again...
instalacja.blad21: The following code is too short, try again...
instalacja.blad22: The following code is too long, try again...
instalacja.blad23: The following code is incorrect, try again...
instalacja.blad24: Given link does not lead to image in format .jpg / .jpeg / .gif / .png, try again...
instalacja.blad25: Incorrect length of the name of the page. Please refer to the rules of nomenclature ().
